summary: The diff implements REQ-1 (hiding WhatsApp number) and partially implements REQ-2 (UPI ID integration). REQ-1 is fully addressed in FloatingWhatsAppButton.tsx. REQ-2 is addressed in PaymentGateway.tsx and WebDesignPaymentModal.tsx, but there is no evidence of changes to PaymentModal, PricingSection, VideoEditingSection, or WebDesignServicesPromo components.

missing_requirements.requirement: Integrate UPI ID 7970705775@ybl into PaymentModal component with UPI ID hidden from UI
missing_requirements.reason: No modification to PaymentModal is visible in the diff. The file is not listed among modified files.

missing_requirements.reason: The frontend-file-summaries.txt mentions PricingSection.tsx but only describes pricing/scroll changes, not UPI ID integration. No UPI-related changes are evident.

missing_requirements.reason: The frontend-file-summaries.txt mentions VideoEditingSection.tsx but only describes price display and WhatsApp button changes, with no mention of UPI ID integration.
